title: Login page not working
description: User unable to log in using Google account.

title: UI layout broken on mobile
description: Header and footer overlap content on small screens.

title: Forgot password email not sent
description: Users report not receiving password reset emails.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Stripe API returns 403 when processing payments.

title: Slow page load time
description: Dashboard takes over 10 seconds to load data.

title: Broken image links
description: Product images not displaying in gallery view.

title: Notification sound not playing
description: No alert sound when new message received.

title: Search feature returns no result
description: Search not showing results even when keyword exists.

title: Profile picture upload fails
description: Uploading profile image shows network error.

title: Dark mode toggle not saving
description: Theme resets to light mode on page refresh.
